roles: member of the High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation

High-level panels are typically temporary advisory bodies with specific mandates that conclude within a year or two. However, since only the appointment year 2018 is explicitly stated in the source material and no end date is provided, I'm setting both start and finish to 2018 to remain conservative with the available information.
